meanings.definition: The vapor into which water is converted when heated, forming a white mist of minute water droplets in the air.
meanings.sent1: The hot tea steams on the table.
meanings.sent2: The bathroom mirror steams up after a hot shower.
meanings.sent3: The steams from the kettle danced in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The steams rising from the lake created a mystical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The steams from the pot enveloped the room in warmth.

meanings.definition: To become covered with steam or vapor.
